paqc.qc_functions package¶

Submodules¶

paqc.qc_functions.qc1 module¶

paqc.qc_functions.qc1.qc1(df, dict_config)¶

Testing if all column names of dataframe have no special characters and no spaces. They should only contain letters, numbers and underscores.

Parameters:df – The qc-ed dataframe
Returns:True/False

paqc.qc_functions.qc3 module¶

paqc.qc_functions.qc3.qc3(df, dict_config)¶

All columns ending in FLAG, COUNT or FREQ should be 0 or positive, and never missing.

Parameters:
  • df – The qc-ed dataframe
  • dict_config – Meta-data in dictionary
Returns:

ReportItem

paqc.qc_functions.qc6 module¶

paqc.qc_functions.qc6.qc6(df, dict_config)¶

Checks that no columns are a 100% empty. :param df: The qc-ed dataframe :param dict_config: Meta-data in dictionary :return: ReportItem

paqc.qc_functions.qc7 module¶

paqc.qc_functions.qc7.qc7(df, dict_config)¶

Checks that no rows are a 100% empty. :param df: The qc-ed dataframe :param dict_config: Meta-data in dictionary :return: ReportItem

paqc.qc_functions.qc8 module¶

paqc.qc_functions.qc8.qc8(df, dict_config)¶

Checks that all columns end with one of the official suffixes in the config, or be equal to the gender, target, patient_id, matched_patient_id cols, or one of the special columns. :param df: The qc-ed dataframe :param dict_config: Meta-data in dictionary :return: ReportItem

Module contents¶

paqc.qc_functions.import_submodules(package)¶

This function will help us load all QC functions from the QC collections and put all the QC functions within a single dictionary.

Parameters:package – package (name or actual module)
Return type:dict[str, types.ModuleType]
